Bhaddavatikā：A market town near Kosambī．TheBuddha went there and was warned by cowherds and others not to approach Ambatittha as a fierce Nāga dwelt there．

Sāgata Thera，hearing this，went to Ambatittha and subdued the Nāga，afterwards rejoining the Buddha at Bhaddavatikā （Vin．iv．108f．; J．i．360f）．

The town is probably identical with Bhaddavatī，and was in the Cetiya Country．Vin．iv．108．
